mapper.select: SELECT G.BRD_NAME AS BRD_NAME, B.BRD_SUBJECT AS BRD_SUBJECT, BR.BRDR_CODE AS BRDR_CODE FROM BOARD B JOIN CREATE_GROUP G ON B.CG_CODE = G.CG_CODE LEFT JOIN BOARD_REPORT BR ON BR.BRD_CODE = B.BRD_CODE WHERE G.CG_CODE = #{cg_code} ORDER BY B.BRD_DATE DESC

SELECT '[' || M.MT_TITLE ||']모임의 '|| M.GM_NICKNAME ||'님 히스토리입니다.' AS HIS_TITLE ,HR.HR_CODE AS HR_CODE FROM MEETING M JOIN ATTEND_OPINION A ON M.MT_CODE = A.MT_CODE JOIN HISTORY H ON A.AO_CODE = H.AO_CODE JOIN GROUP_MEMBER M ON M.GM_CODE = A.GM_CODE JOIN GROUP_INVITE I ON M.GI_CODE = I.GI_CODE LEFT JOIN HISTORY_REPORT HR ON HR.HIS_CODE = H.HIS_CODE WHERE I.CG_CODE = #{cg_code}
SELECT NF_TITLE FROM NOTIFICATION ORDER BY NF_CODE DESC

SELECT M.MT_TITLE AS MT_TITLE, M.MT_MEET AS MT_MEET, C.CT_NAME AS CT_NAME , M.MT_DATE ||' ~ '|| TRUNC(M.MT_MEET-6) AS AO_DATE , RANK () OVER(ORDER BY MT_MEET) AS MT_RANK FROM MEETING M JOIN GROUP_MEMBER G ON M.GM_CODE = G.GM_CODE JOIN GROUP_INVITE I ON I.GI_CODE = G.GI_CODE JOIN CITY C ON C.CT_CODE = M.CT_CODE WHERE I.CG_CODE = #{cg_code} AND MC_CODE = 2 AND 5 < (M.MT_MEET - SYSDATE)

SELECT M.MT_TITLE AS MT_TITLE, M.MT_MEET AS MT_MEET, C.CT_NAME AS CT_NAME , M.MT_DATE ||' ~ '|| TRUNC(M.MT_MEET-6) AS AO_DATE , RANK () OVER(ORDER BY MT_MEET) AS MT_RANK FROM MEETING M JOIN GROUP_MEMBER G ON M.GM_CODE = G.GM_CODE JOIN GROUP_INVITE I ON I.GI_CODE = G.GI_CODE JOIN CITY C ON C.CT_CODE = M.CT_CODE WHERE I.CG_CODE = #{cg_code} AND MC_CODE = 1 AND 5 < (M.MT_MEET - SYSDATE)
